= Introduction =

Some notes on the plugin structure of the Yggdrasil RCP client. 

We separate the client in a few main parts. The basic idea is to have a small base product that is easily installed and rarely updated, and to use an update site to maintain the other components. 

The current structure is being refactored. The sketch below illustrates the suggested changes. The sketch is available as a Visual Paradigm model/diagram in the SVN repository (same folder as the .PNG image).
